participant_1.background:
I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.
I'm not a morning person, I like to take my time getting ready in the morning.
I'm working on finding a new job and trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
i m a night owl , but i m an introvert so i don t go out much or anything.
I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight.

i also eat too much french fries.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.

I am single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.

content.text: Hey there! Hows your day going?
Hey, it's going pretty well so far! Just got off work and I'm about to take a shower.
Oh nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a firefighter. It's definitely not for everyone, but I love it!
That's awesome! I could never do that. I'm too much of a wimp.
Haha, it's not as bad as you think. It's actually a lot of fun!
I'm sure it is. I'm just not cut out for that kind of thing.
Well, you're missing out!
Maybe so. But I'm happy with my job. I'm a writer.
Oh, that's cool! What kind of stuff do you write?
Mostly short stories, but I'm also working on a novel.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a novel, but I've never gotten around to it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the inspiration!
No problem! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, watch movies, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like we have a lot in common! I love to play video games and watch movies too.
That's awesome! What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of games, but I'm really into RPGs and action games right now.
Me too! I love RPGs and action games.
Awesome! We should play some games together sometime.
That would be fun
